opis: Kuća se nalazi na izuzetnoj poziciji, doslovno odmah do mora. Sastoji se od dvorišta s parkingom za 3 vozila, 3 odvojene stambene jedinice na dvije etaže (prizemlje i 1. kat). Prizemlje se koristi kao privatna vikendica, dok su na katu 2 lijepo uređena apartmana koja se koriste za dnevni najam. U krugu od 30 metara nalaze se: dućani, pošta, ambulanta, mesnica, tržnica, ljekarna, restorani, kafići itd. Nekretnina je dvojni objekt te se nalazi 13 km od odvojka s autoceste Zagreb-Zadar. Više info na geofly.immobilien@gmail.com ili 095 829 1188 ENG The house is located in an exceptional position, literally right by the sea. It consists of a yard with parking for 3 vehicles, 3 separate residential units on two floors (ground floor and 1st floor). The ground floor is used as a private cottage, while on the first floor there are 2 beautifully decorated apartments that are used for daily rent. Within 30 meters there are: shops, post office, clinic, butcher, market, pharmacy, restaurants, cafes, etc. The property is a semi-detached house and is located 13 km from the branch of the Zagreb-Zadar highway.
